original_text: The people ate, and they all had enough food. After the people had eaten, there were still lots of small pieces of food. Jesus' disciples filled seven baskets with these pieces.
korean_text: 배불리 먹고 남은 조각 일곱 광주리를 거두었으며

sentences.original_text: and they all had enough food
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 모두 충분한 음식을 먹었다

sentences.original_text: there were still lots of small pieces of food
sentences.korean_translation: 여전히 많은 작은 음식 조각들이 있었다
